name: spotify_control
description: Complete Spotify control: search music, play/pause/skip, manage playlists, add to queue. Supports batch operations to combine multiple actions in ONE call (saves API credits!). Can create playlists with unlimited songs using semicolon-separated queries.

query.description: Search query for tracks/artists/albums/playlists. For multiple tracks, separate with semicolons: 'track1; track2; track3'. Used with: search, play, add_to_playlist, add_to_queue actions.

spotify_id.description: Spotify ID of content to play or playlist to modify. Alternative to query for direct ID-based operations.

playlist_name.description: Name for new playlist (for create_playlist action)

playlist_description.description: Description for new playlist (for create_playlist action)

track_ids.description: Comma-separated list of Spotify track IDs to add to playlist. Example: 'id1,id2,id3'. Used with add_to_playlist action.

songs.description: Semicolon-separated song queries for creating playlists with songs. NO LIMIT on number of songs! Example: 'bohemian rhapsody; stairway to heaven; hotel california; ...'. Used with create_playlist action.

limit.description: Limit for search results or playlist listing (1-50)

operations.description: List of operation objects for batch execution (execute_batch action only). Each operation contains 'action' and its required parameters. Combines multiple Spotify operations in ONE API call to save credits! Example: [{'action': 'create_playlist', 'playlist_name': 'My Mix', 'songs': 'track1; track2'}, {'action': 'play', 'query': 'My Mix', 'content_type': 'playlist'}]
